name: Keno Casino Party Gold-Land PRO
description:
**READY TO WIN YOUR FORTUNES?**

**DAILY BONUSES**

Get ready for classic keno fun! Select your 20 lucky numbers and watch intensely to see if the random balls match. The more you rush to bet, the quicker you'll hit the jackpot.

INCLUDES:
• No Ads
• Bet calculator
• Retro Casino Feel
• Quick Pick Select (Random Numbers)
• Save your Credits between sessions
• 5 Speeds to choose from
• Auto-Play and Auto-Bet

Easy to play, just bet and tap the numbers . If you like slot machines, powerball, bingo, and other video casino games, you will love kenogames.

Fantastic payouts with daily extra bonus credits. Have fun winning those Gold Eggs ;)
